overview:
Kevin is a Computer Science grad student who started up right after college. Was a researcher in the field of Assistive technology for visually impaired people. Worked on an Alternative Input Method for Visually Impaired People called “Isleen Aid” and “Track Manager” -A navigational aid for visually impaired people.

He is currently working on a platform to create, manage and distribute digital passes across all major platforms for merchants,brands and event ticketing companies.
